H0.text: what to visit in atlanta. Georgia Aquarium

H3.text: what to visit in atlanta. Buckhead

A4.text: The aquarium's notable specimens include whale sharks, beluga whales, California sea lions, bottlenose dolphins, manta rays, sea otters, and tiger sharks.

A5.text: It was the largest aquarium in the world from its opening in 2005 until 2012 when it was surpassed by the S.E.A. Aquarium in Singapore and the Chimelong Ocean Kingdom in China;
